CustomField.description: CAUTION - USED IN INTEGRATIONS Host Controls is an add-on service for Premium level Operator-Assisted audio conferences. It is an online tool that enables the meeting organizer to view who has joined the call, manage the question queue during Q&A ,and chat with the conference operator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Yes" if an ECD has been requested for this event.
CustomField.label: Host Controls
